Description: Bowl. Wall sherd with dripped decoration of opaque green, yellow and purple in an opaque whitish glaze. Outside with apple-green blotches. Fayyumi-wares, made of reddish earthenware.
Acquisition name: Donated by: Charles Drury Edward Fortnum (?)
Acquisition notes: Paper note accompanying object: "Fragments presented by C. Drun, Fortnum (1887), H. Wallis (1895), etc."
